name: Fly on IT Pty Ltd
overview:
Fly on IT has been named as Top Website and Graphic Designers in Werribee for 2012!, this is based on the recent reviews for us. We also been ranked top 10 iPhone development company in Australia by the BestWebDesignAgencies.com for December 2011. Fly on IT has been Finalist in 2011 Wyndham Business Awards and voted as a Local Favourite in the 2010 Leader Awards - Melbourne’s Local Favourites. See for details - http://flyonit.com.au/about-us/our-awards.html

Fly on IT Pty Ltd - “Your business on autopilot” is a supplier of automation web tools for your business, operating from Melbourne, Victoria.

We can provide innovative

business system to ensure any activity or action can be performed in a consistent manner by all employees at any point in time. With effective business systems, you can: • Step away from daily tasks. • Reduce or eliminate redundant processes. • Emp ower employees and make them accountable. • Make your business more desirable to buyers. We can help you with multi-platform development, all integrated and functioning as one system, ie 1) Desktop Browser (IE, FireFox, Chrome, Safari, etc) 2) Mobile Phone Browser (Nokia, Blackberry, iPhone, Samsung, Android, etc.) 3) iPhone/iPad/iPod app

ADVANTAGES:

  • Over 10 years of experience.

    • Fixed fee per project.

Our recently updated portfolio:

http://flyonit.com.au/about-us/our-portfolio.html

Graphics Design Portfolio:

http://www.flyonit.com.au/images/pdfs/logo%20portfolio.pdf

We guarantee our workmanship and we are :

  1. We are registered for GST,
  2. We are Australian Registered company
  3. We have Public Liability Insurance.
  4. We provide fixed cost quote, with 100% money back guarantee.

Other services we provide:

  • Website design and development - Online Marketing :- SEO, PPC, newsletter
  • Customer Relationship Management (CRM)
  • Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP)
  • Content Management System (CMS)
    • IT consultancy
  • IT support for small business
  • iPhone/ iPad/ Android applications
  • cloud computing
  • Software Development
  • Graphics (logo, flyer, brochure, business card, etc)design

Opening Hours: M: 9:00 am to 5:00 pm T: 9:00 am to 5:00 pm W: 9:00 am to 5:00 pm T: 9:00 am to 5:00 pm F: 9:00 am to 5:00 pm S: by appointment S: by appointment PHol: by appointment
